content: **my first 2 scrappy blankets proved to be so popular so i m back with a third and i think you ll find this one equally satisfying for using up all those little balls of leftover yarn ** it s a super easy to remember pattern a repetitive 1 2 3 4 5 rhythm makes it an excellent choice if you re looking for a mindful crochet project **this is a beginner level pattern written in uk & us terms ** there are video tutorials to help you if you need them instructions are included for 5 different sizes pram cot small throw large throw single bed and 4 different yarn thicknesses 4ply dk aran chunky this blanket is reversible **you will need** * lots and lots and lots of scraps or odd balls of yarn in your chosen thickness i made mine in dk/ 8ply * appropriate size hook for your yarn thickness i used 5mm
